name: LemFi
headline: LemFi banks the world's emerging market immigrants.
description: LemFi is a digital bank for the African diaspora. There are over 20 million African immigrants in North America and Europe with many running businesses back home and we provide multi-currency accounts to help manage their unique banking needs.

founders.name: Rian Cochran, Founder
founders.description: Experienced finance leader with extensive experience building fintechs in Africa and Asia (Opay, Okash, Cashbean)

# International payments for everyone
### Open multi-currency accounts. Send and receive money globally.
Enter your phone number to download
![Canada](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images-staging/country-canada.svg)
Download now
![LemFi mobile app home page, send money page and visa card](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images/appid-49627marketing-hero-mascot.svg)
![LemFi mobile app home page, send money page and visa card](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images/appid-12221right-side-illustration.webp)
Backed by and featured on
One platform for all your 
payments international 
![plain background with dollar and euro icon](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images/appid-11799open-global-bank-accounts-bg.png)
![animation](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images-staging/appid-25650open-global-bank-accounts-phone.webp)
## Open global accounts
Open accounts in US Dollars, Canadian Dollars, and Great British Pounds in minutes.
[See more](https://lemfi.com/</en-ca/global-accounts>)
## International money transfer
Move money to multiple destinations across the globe
[See more](https://lemfi.com/</en-ca/international-money-transfer>)
![plain background with dollar coin](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images/appid-70171international-money-transfer-bg.png)
![animation](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images-staging/appid-67784international-money-transfer-phone.webp)
![plain background](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images/appid-27210currency-conversion-bg.png)![LemFi man jumping accross a tennis net wiith flag players](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images/appid-91940marketing-currency-conversion.webp)
![animation](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images-staging/appid-11717currency-conversion-phone.webp)
## Currency conversion
Convert money from one currency to another at the best value
[See more](https://lemfi.com/</en-ca/international-money-transfer>)
## Receive or request money
Send money requests or share a payment link for your friends and even customers to pay via bank transfers, card or even mobile money.
[See more](https://lemfi.com/</en-ca/request-money>)
![plain background](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images/appid-30710request-money-bg.png)![LemFi man happily holding a coin](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images/appid-48010marketing-request-money.webp)
![animation](https://d1c5a9xrl5sbk8.cloudfront.net/images-staging/appid-14886request-money-phone.webp)
## Send money at the best value!
### We charge little to no fees for you to spend your own money
###  No monthly or subscription fees
###  No minimum balance
###  Low foreign transfer fees

### Shafina
Actor, United Kingdom
Pakistan
INTERNATIONAL PAYMENTS FOR EVERYONE

We are growing and expanding fast, join our waitlist and we will give you a shout-out when we launch in your country.
Join waitlist

## How we protect your money and identity
## Got questions?
### Some of most frequently asked questions.
Is LemFi a bank?
LemFi is a financial technology company and is not a bank. RightCard Payment Services Limited is registered with the Financial Conduct Authority, in the UK as an Electronic Money Institution. In Canada, LemFi is registered and regularised by the Financial Transactions and Report Analysis Centre of Canada. In the United States, the remittance and bank services program is sponsored by Community Federal Savings Bank
Where is LemFi available?
LemFi provides global financial services to immigrants. LemFi is available in Canada, Europe, the United Kingdom and the United States. We are expanding to more countries with tailored services soon and we will keep you informed.
How does LemFi work?
Download the LemFi app on your Android or iPhone mobile device and sign up for free. Verify your identity and add money into your LemFi account by topping up via your card or bank account. Choose your destination country and currency. Enter your recipient's details and approve the payment instruction. Learn more
[See general FAQs](https://lemfi.com/<https:/support.lemfi.com/hc/en-us>)
## See for yourself how easy it is to move your money around the world with LemFi.
Download now

generated_description:
LemFi is not just another fintech startup; it's a lifeline for the millions of immigrants from emerging markets, particularly the African diaspora. Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, LemFi is headquartered in London and has a robust team of around 60 employees. The concept is surprisingly simple yet profoundly impactful: it caters to the banking needs of over 20 million African immigrants in North America and Europe who often juggle businesses back in their home countries.

LemFi believes in providing solutions that are attuned to the unique financial challenges faced by these communities. Their multi-currency accounts allow immigrants to effortlessly manage their finances across borders. The company’s mission—streamlined under the slogan "LemFi banks the world’s emerging market immigrants"—is to empower these individuals to thrive financially through effective payment solutions.

What does LemFi actually do? They offer a variety of essential financial services, including:
- **International money transfers** to over 29 countries, making it easier for people to send money home.
- **Global accounts**, which let users open and manage multiple currency accounts in USD, CAD, and GBP.
- The ability to **request money** via a straightforward payment link, facilitating smoother transactions among users.

If you're interested in what they offer, they've conveniently packaged their services in a sleek mobile app that emphasizes simplicity and transparency—think little to no fees, no required monthly payments, and no minimum balances. Trust is key in finance, and LemFi addresses this explicitly by employing stringent security measures. They work as a financial technology entity, not a bank, operating under the regulation of entities like the UK’s Financial Conduct Authority and Canadian regulations.

With the support of notable figures like Michael Seibel, LemFi is garnering attention for its innovative solutions in the financial sector. Their current growing presence spans the U.S., Canada, the UK, and Europe, with aspirations to expand even further. 

For anyone looking to send money, open accounts, or request funds internationally, LemFi positions itself as a compelling and accessible choice. You can learn more about their mission and their services by visiting their website at [lemfi.com](https://lemfi.com) or through their social media channels. In a world that’s increasingly global, LemFi is here to make your financial transactions as seamless as possible.
